transcription:
I have been struck by how little attention the Institute for Digital Archaeology have paid to the human stories behind the arch, Palmyra and everything which they represent.
I met several people today whose personal memories and stories, I think, were much more worth preserving. It is sad when a unique object is destroyed but it is truly devastating when we neglect and forget the human actions and thoughts behind them.
